body:
You could also look at building Caffe2 / Torch via [ExternalProject](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/module/ExternalProject.html). It seems to be a lot easier than the submodule solution. See [here](https://gist.github.com/kleisauke/37840a740127850dc0ffa1a96f1a5a0a) for an example (don't forget to call `include(ExternalProject)`).

Good luck!
